text: Ri Pablo xubꞌij: Uj uj aj Roma, xujkirapuj16:37 Ri taqanik pa Roma kubꞌij chi ri winaq aj Roma, man kuya taj karapux jun we man etaꞌmatalik jas ri umak. chikiwach konojel ri winaq, man nabꞌe ta na xkiqꞌat tzij pa qawiꞌ. Chanim kꞌut are kakaj kujel bꞌik chaꞌwal, man kuya ta ri. Chepet na aꞌreꞌ, jujul kitzoqopij kan rukꞌ kiqꞌabꞌ.
